q: . Nuggets coach George Karl would like to get Allen Iverson some rest, but there's no time, not with the Nuggets currently on the outside glancing into the playoffs. They trail Golden State for the last spot. I don't think we can lose a[ player] because of an injury the rest of the way, George Karl said.`` It's the time of year where we have to play like it's a playoff circumstance. Everybody is hurting a little bit-- AI is probably at the top of the list.''

The ruling party headquarters building next door to the museum was still in flames and billowing black smoke into the sky on Saturday, a day after protesters torched it during mass anti-government demonstrations. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, antiquities boss Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks try to extinguish the blaze in the NDP headquarters. Iraq has been worth the cost and remains largely unapologetic about his handling of the conflict, The Washington Post reported on Wednesday. Had the government of Saddam Hussein remained in power the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today, Donald Rumsfeld wrote in his 800-page memoir, scheduled for release on Tuesday. The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him.`` You know, I love Eminem but... While it's`` far too early'' for the congresswoman to speak, Kirsten Gillibrand said, she's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and understand and show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. Gabrielle Giffords began breathing without a ventilator yesterday as doctors took out the breathing tube that had run down her throat and replaced it with a tracheotomy tube in her windpipe. Surgeons also inserted a feeding tube.
